Why you should join Conzooming as a rider

easy & secure

Secured withdrawals

Enjoy hassle-free withdrawals directly to your account, ensuring quick access to your earnings whenever you need them

earn more

Increased earning possibilities

Enjoy the opportunity to earn competitive income with flexible hours, maximising your earnings while balancing your schedule.

support

24/7 Support

Need assistance or facing an issue? Just chat with us through the rider app

Get started easily in 3 steps

Sign up

Register on our platform, and we'll verify your details to get you started

Get verified

We take time to complete the necessary checks to verify your identity and confirm your right to work

Start delivering

After verification, you'll receive an email confirming your rider account is active and ready for orders

Join Conzooming as a rider

To join Conzooming as a rider

  • You must be at least 18 years old
  • Must have a Smartphone (Android or iOS)
  • You must own a bicycle, motorcycle or car with the right license and insurance

Become a part of our expanding network, either as a vendor or rider.
